Blog.post: im just sittin here waiting for a ride to go over lauren's. today is gonna be a really short day cause i woke up at like 1 o'clock. thats probably the latest i slept all summer yet. today pretty much consisted of me saying im bored and hungry, so i ordered from the bm deli, which was pretty good. now im off to lauren's and then around 530 or somethin i have bm basketball sign ups. i dont even know why i bother. but its me, i always end up getting involved with it one way or another and if i dont sign up people will say "omg why didnt you sing up, you should have". amanda and erin are at konobles today so im basically alone, which sucks. i soo need a vacation, away from people down here, idk how much more i can take. i wish i could go back to the carribean with a few of my friends and thats it. that was awsome, id have to say that was the best vacation i ever went on. this year im going to LBI nj with erin, amanda, and erin's parents, so hopefully that will go well and ill get a good vacation out of that away from my family. i honestly wouldnt even mind if i just went to a hotel for a couple days by myself as a vacation.. well i g2g to lauren's. write later. *LoViNg Is NoT hOw u FoRgEt, BuT HoW u FoRgIvE... NoT hoW u LiStEn, BuT hoW u UnDeRsTaNd... NoT WaT u SeE BuT hOw u FeeL.. aNd NoT hOW u LeT gO, But HoW u HoLd On..* - molly <3

well, i just got back from my game bout an hour ago. we won thank god. it was a pretty good game i guess. im really tired now, and kinda bored. i wish i actually had a life, and at the rate im goin it doesnt look like im getting one any time soon. im gonna try to go to bed decently early tonight so i dont end up wakein up at 12 tomorrow. the part that sucks is that tomorrow is gonna be the same as today cuz amanda and erin are goin to konobles, and im stuck at home alone, with my family once again. i dont know how much more of this i can take. thursday is pretty much an open day and friday i have basketball practice at 430 to like 545 or somethin, idk. my coach keeps telling us we need to get into shape and by the end of the summer im hopefully gonna be in shape. yeah i think its pretty safe to say my life sucks...its way to confusing. im only 14 and already my life is a nightmare. well not a nightmare but still its pretty sucky. i mean compared to how things were before things are looking up. which is a good thing for me. well i need sleep and food before i pass out at my computer desk. write later. Cryin doesnt always mean ur sad,just like smilin doesnt always mean ur happy... - molly

this post is probably gonna be very short or very long. one or the other. so far today is a pretty boring day. i woke up ar like 12 and now im sittin here waiting for my aunt sophie to come home with wendys for me! hopefully today woant be as boring as it seems. i cant believe im still tired. hopefully today people will call me to do something, like lastnight. i basically sat in a car and drove around all night. itsthe closest i get to driving until im 16. i feel like going out to eat. but im broke, which is not unusual for me. i wish i worked a little more then every other weekend sometimes so i could make more money and not go through it like water. right now im watching "real world", its actually pretty decent this season. well i think im gonna get somethin to drink and end this post. write later. - molly <3

im back as you probably could tell... i was extremely bored so i decided to post again. my time is messed up on this blog... i gotta fix it sometime, ill get around to it tonight hopefully. i think im getting sick. i woke up with a sore throat and i'v been coughing all day. today sucks, not only do i not feel good, everyone is inside and no1 has called me except erin today and she had to go over her friends house like an hour ago. so im basically alone, with my family, shoot me now. i already went through this a couple days ago and i stayed in the house for about 4 hours and i started freaking out at people. as you could tell i dont have patience. wow the song im listeing to brings back memories... here without you by 3 doors down, good times. isnt it sad when people change completely and not in a good way, i could cry just thinking about it. well i guess this is just a lesson on not to live in the past, and to look ahead. if only i could take my own advice... i wanna do something tonight but no one is out. oh man, i forgot i have a game tomorrow at 8... well atleast its not a double header like last week. i almost killed myself at conditioning on saturday. all we did was run,run, and run. i think the part that really killed me was when i forgot to streach and my right leg cramped when we were doin suicides and i limped across the court. as much as i wanna play varsity next year and play, i hate running constantly, and then shooting foul shots and not having 60% from the foul line. im actually tired right now, but if i go take a nap now im not gonna sleep tonight, and it hate it when that happens. i feel like watching a movie. yesterday i saw "the notebook" omg that was good. ofcourse no guy is gonna say that it was good cuz it was more of a love story. id actually like to read the book, only if i had time, and that is one thing i dont have this summer, time. im not gonna say what the movie was about cuz not everybody saw it, im just gonna leave it as "the best love story of the summer". it actually reminded me of the movie "sweet home alabama". okay, ill shut up about the movie now. im hoping someone will call me sometime soon to do something tonight. i dont think anyone knows how bad i wanna drive. hopefully my brother will still give me his durango... im just keepin me fingers crossed. i still cant believe hes getting married. og my brother of all people... ahha thats actually funny, but im still happy for him and kim. wow this is really long for one of my 1st posts. well im gonna go and find something to do. write later. ThErE cOmEs A pOiNt iN yOuR LiFe WhEn yOu ReaLize WhO Matters - WhO NeVeR Did - WhO aLwAyS wiLL - molly <3

hello, welcome to my blog... 1st off id like to thank the little people who helped me make this blog possible. Jon, thank you for helping me through the simple steps of making this. Lauren, thanks for being there for moral support ahah. I guess this when i introduce myself. I'm Molly and im a normal 14 yr old living in good ol' beaver ghettos. I enjoy hanging out with my friends around town, riding bikes, playing basketball, and listein to music. My life is somewhat normal, i guess it depends on what you think normal is. I will try to update this as often as possible for your viewing pleasure. It all depends if I have a life the day im typing this or not. Well I guess I'm done with this entry, I'll write later if I have time. I'll end this entry with a quote... Popularity lasts til' yearbook day, respect lasts forever... - Molly

well tonight pretty much consisted of me gettin ready to go to work. tonight sucked, it was so slow. then tan gave me a ride home. it turns out that my dad didnt get home till like 1230. its now almost 1 and im waiting for him to come inside cuz i wanna go to bed. tomorrow is probably gonna be boring once again. well im goin to bed hopefully. write later. - much love molly

read the lyrics, d/l it or w.e. urlLink http://lyrics.astraweb.com/displayp.cgi?blaque..unknown..im_good basically describes how i feel right about now, and its stuck in my head haha. write later - molly

well let me tell you how my wonderful night ended. it ended with a freakin pervert mesg. me sayin i had a nice ass and etc. , well they cna take that comment and shove it up their ass. everbody knows you dont mesg. a girl your intrested in and tell them that, what are they fuckin retarted. and people wonder why im single, because the feeakin retarts that do like me go and mesg. me and say stupid shit. now, to top everything off i now i have basketball practice almost everyday of the week, and the league starts monday, oh well i guess im only gonna play fridays. its gonna be basketball every single day of the week. i know im gonna end up hurting myself. my ancles really havnt been bothering me but still. i have to go to play with varsity tonight, god help me. i seriously dont think kim weinches likes me (starting point guard for hafey). well i think im gonna go get a shower. write later. no matter wat yur mind tells yu yur heart will never forget `the person who made it skip a beat soo many timesz `·.·´¯`` - molly

well tonight i had basketball practice. i didnt do bad once again for a change. i dont think i ever sweat that much in my life haha. the part that sucks is that we have it again tomorrow night at 6:30, with just senior high. im gonna have no life once the season starts. jeez... the things i do for basketball. im really tired tonight. i wish i could find somethin to do cuz im bored outta my mind. now that i think about it last year around this time, i wouldnt even be home right about now ahah. i was usually playin basketball up the courts or walking around town. now my life consists of going out ocasionally, going to basketball about 3 times a week and going on the computer to talk to people. wow what a life. i guess i really should complain that much cuz i do get out sometimes. i really like this song (kanye west ft. jay-z - never let me down). too bad it doesnt refer to my life. i hope the beaver meadow league starts soon, that way i dont have to deal with this house anymore. people just drive me crazy, and its not just my family. its times like this where i just wanna say thank you so much mr. keiper for scheduling basketball practice. haha. i dont want school to start. how about today i got a letter in the mail from hafey saying that the heels of the shoes for the girls can ONLY BE ONE INCH !! im pissed, cuz how the hell am i gonna find a shoes with a one inch heel, seriously, commen sense. i refuse to wear flat shoes, i mean im pretty short the way it is. i dont really wanna actually show people how short i am. ugh... i just gotta keep thinking "molly your there for basketball". well im gonna go talk to people on mirc and aim. write later If it never really was what you seen in me Why did you say you believed in me Its all because of you my security Its driving me crazy baby If it never really was what you had for me Why did you say that you wanted me, needed me If it never really was what you ment for me Tell me... - mario winans *never really was*

hello. haha i just woke up, and its like almsot 230. i guess cuz im making up for all the sleep i missed the past few days. i have no idea what im doing today. i gotta get a shower yet. im so bored right now. i wanna go out or do somethin. its times like this i wish i could drive, then i would never be home. yesterday we had a scrimage game against 7 & 8 graders and stuff it was fun. i think we have it agin tomorrow. i had 2 threes and 1 jump shot or somethin like that. i did pretty good for a change. the only thing was my feet were killin me because of burning them on the concrete at dannys. they dont really hurt today, thank god. i need to change my template for this, its starting to get broing. well im gonna go do that and probably get a shower or somethin. write later. i dunno weather to... [h.a.t.e] him for who he is [l.o.v.e] him for who he was or be [s.a.d] because he changed... - molly

ugh. today i had to wake up at 9 to go pick up my aunt. that wwasnt too bad, even though i went to bed at like 1230 lastnight. i think im gonna die at the scrimage game today at 630. oh no, and i just remb. family is comin over for supper today... ahhhhhhhh!~ im so stuffed it sint even funny. we went to perkins to get somethin to eat, and i think i ate wayy too much. my feet seriously kill from yesterday. i think i burnt them on the concrete over lauren's cousin danny's when we were playin basketball. guys piss me off, or ya know what people just piss me off and ill leave it at that. i wish people would just keep their f`in comments to themselves, that would solve a lot of problems now wouldnt it? im tired. i think im gonna go and do my chores and stuff before my family gets here for supper. write later. I gave you all my love from the very start Now you leave me with a torn heart . - molly

hello! im sure everybody missed me the two days i was gone, well actually 1 1/2 haha. i will tell ya how my past few days went. okay frieday night noelle picked me up with her two friends nicole and danielle. we went to the movies to see a cinderell story (it was good). then after the movie we drove around and stuff talked to people and had a few experiences ahhaha. after that we went to mcdonalds and then went and dropped everybody off . me and noelle then went to pick up brian , jeremy's (noelle's brother) friend, then once we picked him up we went for gas at sheets and then headed to neolle's house. then the next morning we went to knobles! that was fun... but the beg. wasnt too good. we lost the car and then in the process of looking for it noelle lost her sunglasses. but overall it was fun. then we went back to tresckow. we decided to go for another ride. tonight was an experience and a half haha. well im goin to bed cuz i got church tomorrow morning. write later xOxO molly

well today is goin to be a busy day. im goin to the movies with noelle, idk what time cuz she has to call me from work. after the movie im sleepin over her house and then hopefully saturday were goin to konobles. well so far i gotta get a shower and get dressed and do my chores. oh well. hmm.. im bored, i probably should be doin my chores but i dont feel like it. oh yeah i forgot i gotta pack yet too. well im gonna go and try to accomplish all of these tasks (wow i sounded smart there hahah). write later. [ i ] Kn0 a LoT MoRe ThEn YoU ThOuGhT [ i ] DiD [ i ] FoUnD ouT a LoT oF ThInGs YoU ThOuGhT *YoU [ HiD ] - molly

i think im in a better mood. well lets hope not just for my sake but other peoples sake haha. i was lookin at cell phones. i need a new one really bad. i think i wanna switch to verizon, unless i get a nice flip phone from nextel. i wonder if i can just get a new and keep the same plan that i have, cuz i love my plan. im really bored. today i talked about paiting my room, and i think i might, since i have a lot of time on my hands lately. oh man i hope i go over my aunt house tomorrow cuz this heat is killin' me. nobody will put the freak air conditioner on! its like wtf your hot put it on! ugh. but hey whatever i say doesnt matter. i love how i always learn the hard way with stuff. i have come to an conclusion. guys suck (period) . ugh im so pissed off with that whole situation right now i could almost explode. i try not to think about it. oh man i cant wait till friday. im saposed to go to the movies and then sleep over noelle's and then goin to konobles saturday with her. its gonna be awsome! wow im bored now. idk what to do anymore since basketball is kinda over. well actually the league is startin in like 4 days soo i shouldnt be talkin really. well im gonna go and try to convince someone to turn on a freakin air conditioner before i pass out. right about now my whole family is pissin me off. ugh. write later. have yOu ever felt so . alOne . that nOthinq ever makes sense yOu feel aS iF ur faCinq eVery ThinG by yoUrseLf with nOthinq but tears * and a · . · » F a k e ][ S m i l e « · . · - molly

well today so far was a pretty interesting day. wow i hate people. ugh... i am not going to say who, but at the moment he is on my blocked list on aim. i dont remb. being this mad ever. i think this is going to be the last time i ever tell anybody i care about him, cuz look what it gives me. f*** it. i wanna see somebody piss me off today. im hungry i didnt eat all day yet. sometimes i gotta wonder if all guys really like to mess with girls heads. well im gonna go ponder that. lol. write later. -:+:when i think of all the time:+:- ---[wasted]--- .*.tryinq tO make thinqz wOrk wit us.*. \\ cant even believe hOw stupid// ...i was but itz Ok nOw cuz... --->[i mOved On] - molly

well, today is boring as hell if you ask me, and lastnight, well lets just say it wasnt a good night. some people ,and i am not going to say who, need to think about what they say before they say it. im going to leave it at that. i need to work on my temper. i get pissed off too easily and i handle it in all the wrong ways. oh well. i dont know what im doing tonight... ill probably figure out something to do eventually. but i do have plans friday! for a change. i feel like playin bball. but id have to play alone, which would suck. i wonder if there are games tonight at the hs for saullo... i think there is. i wonder if lauren is home. maybe ill clean my room or something if i have a lot of time on my hands. well im goin to find somethin to do. write later. It aint me, im sorry you got the wrong one It aint me, I just came out to have fun It aint me, go out and find another one I don't like what your kickin' son, now leave Cause even if I leave alone, I'm good And even if you come along, I'm good Don't mean a thing to me cause, I'm good With or without you If you wanna play games with me then, I'm good Say what you do for me than, I'm good You don't really mean a thing cause, I'm good With or without you - molly

well i just got back from my game and we won ! i had 2pts. i actually did pretty well. i had a fast break and for a change i made the layup. today i woke up at like 230 haha. i think it was cuz i was up till like 2 lastnight watch honey. oh man i love that movie. i think im gonna watch it again tonight if i have nothin else to do. i decided im gonna repait my room, my father just doesnt know it yet haha. i think im gonna paint it either like a pale orange cuz its my favorite color or like a pale lime green. i already picked out my bed sheets. maybe ill paint it a pale pink. idk. ill figure it out eventually. hmm.. im bored, i should go outside its nice out. maybe ill go out and dribble or somethin. i wish i ahd a pool. id jump in it right now haha. i should go over my aunt's one of these days again and go swimming, who knows. tomorrow i think im goin to the movies with noelle idk what time tho, ahah wow my life is a mystery. i never know what im doing. well im goin to find somethin to do. write later. you qave me butterflies whenever i saw you but now whenever youre around i qet this "qet away i dont want anything to do with you" [ f . e . e . l . i . n . q . ] - molly

wow for once im actually home. haha and the funny part is im walkin out the door again in a couple mins. well lets see. friday i went with my aunts to newark airport to pick up my aunt barbra who flew in from LA, and all thanks to my cousin david backing out i got to go. i got to sit and talk all the way to newark and back (and yes you do spell it "newark") . then yesterday was the wedding shower or should i say "family reunion" idk wtf it was, haha but it was somethin. im sad to say that i actually had fun. i mostly hung out with my cousin ashley (came in from kansas) , my uncle tommy (lives in williamsport), my cousin ethan (lives in williamsport) and my uncle donald (lives in drums) . me and my uncles were bustin people sooo bad it was pathetic. oh yeah and i got to spend some of the afternoon as the leader of little kids. ie. me and ashley get outta the pool and go into the hot tub, the little kids follow, etc. then lastnight i had work. it was actually kinda busy for a change, and i didnt do too bad. oh and i had conditioning in the morning. i ahd to wake up at quarter to 9, keep in mind i took like a 6 hour drive down and back to newark and we got home at like 1230- 1. now today i had ot wake up at 9, and i got home at like 11 lastnight from work. not too bad, but im still really tired, oh damn i gotta serve today. ugh. idk if im even gonna be home tomorrow some of the time cuz i have a game. mr. keiper said that me katie and steva should go play 9th grade bball on the jr. high team (technically we were saposed to play on there, but we just didnt. haha). wow this is a long blog. im tired, and i wanna go back to bed cuz its raining. well i have to go to church now, and serve *sigh*. write later. ·*¨) ¸.·´i GoT a HaBiT ( oF FaLLiN 2 HaRd 2 FaST `·.¸_¸.·'´¨) N GeTTiN MY HOPEs UP (_¸.·*» 4 ShYT I KNO wOnT LAST! - molly

i really wonder if anyone actually reads this. well anyway. im taking a break from cleaning. tonight im actually going to have a life. im going out to that dinner and a movie thingy to see umm.. wtf is that movie called, oh yeah the stepford wives! i think its at 9:20, so i probably wont be home till like 11. wow you know what song is annoying, nelly - flap your wings, wtf was he thinking. the begg. of the song is pretty good when hes rappin, but the line" drop down and get your eagle on gurl"? wtf? its on trl right now. well i dont know what else i have to do before i go besides get a shower and get ready. wow people are gay, i dont even know why i bother to be nice or attempt to ake convorsation, when its basically like talking to a wall. i can't wait to go out tonight, im bored out of my mind and if i have to spend another min. with my family i am going to loose it. i can only ask one question... why cant i be 16!?! then i could atleast drive with a permit or do something with my "exciting" life. yeah i wish... well im gonna go finish cleaning or do something until i have to get in for a shower. write later. I can call you muh baby boi you can call me yer baby gurl maybe we can spend some time I can be yer [sunshine] - molly

what a day. i was saposed to wake up at 1130, but noooo. nobody in my house knows how to wake anybody up on time. i then wake up to my aunt sophie screaming molly phone. turns out it was lauren asking me if they were giving me a ride to prcatice. in my mind im thinking practice, practice, as i look at the clock, its 1230, my basketball practice is at 1. im screamin at the top of my lungs at that moment sayin why didnt she wake me up. i was pissed ,very pissed. i didnt get a shower i basically walked outta the house with a pair of flip flops on carrying my sneakers and i forgot my gatorade. somehow i managed to be only 5 mins. late. then to make the day even worse they were goin over the play "flex", which is basically a bunch of screens when the other team is playin man on you. do you think i could grasp it. ofcourse not. i think im in a basketball "slump" haha, god only knows. maybe im just havin another rough week. i was gonna go to the cinema draft house thingy tonight but instead im going tomorrow. well hopefully, i need to get away from my family. for a change im actually looking forward to work this weekend. now thats pathetic. i need to start running. im really out of shape, all i do is sit around. well im goin to find somethin to do. write later. * im about to see a million things that i thought id never see before. and im about to do all the things i dreamed of and i dont even miss you at all - molly

well i just got back from my game, and we won, suprisingly. i didnt do too well, considering how long i played because i gave up the ball like twice. im just out of it today. yea, completely out of it. im just gonna go with that. my brother is here at the moment, and let me tell ya i just like "constructive critisism". well it could be worse, much worse. tomorrow i have open gym at 1. i seriously need to learn how to run those plays, oh man im lost on them. well im goin. write later. - molly

well im bored. and i still have like 2 1/2 hours till my game. i dont think im gonna play too well tonight cuz i got a lot of stuff on my mind. and i finally realized that i really screwed up with my whole life, im not gonna get into why and how i did that exactly. i just hope i play well tonight, its my last game and i really wanna play point. i dont feel good now. i dont think anybody has any idea how bad i wanna move cuz my life is so messed up right now i could cry myself to sleep everynight. i just need somebody to talk to that i can trust and i can tell everything. well i need to get into a somehwat good mood before me game otherwise im gonna be a mess. ill write later. wish me luck. *everytime you built me up you only let me down... - molly

what a night, or should i say day? lauren slept over lastnight, it was pretty fun actually. we decided to go to the movies to see sleepover, which pretty much blew, but hey atleast i got an oreo creme blast outta it. we pretty much spent the night on the computer, and then we watch comedy central which was hilarious... omg. then we attempted to play gamecube while we were on a sugar high, and we sucked. ahah. i actually got pissed off and threw the controller, and then lauren took over from there. i think the next game i wanna buy for it is some game involving huns, so i can take out my anger. all i have is water powered jet packs and a vacum that sucks up ghosts, (wow). *sigh* i have a game today at 7... anybody wanna go? and then you can watch us get killed by weatherly cuz WE SUCK! and i swear if i get put as guard again im gonna die. i think the marian game scared me for life. ever since then i dont like bringin the ball up against big scary girls (*cringes at the thought*). well im gonna get dressed or somethin, who knows. write later. DoNt HaVe tHa HeArT tO HaTe yOu iTz tHa LaSt ThInG i WaNnA dO BuT i nO LoNgEr HaVe tHe HeArT tO Luv yOu CaUsE i KnO u DoNt LuV mE tOo - molly </3

well today i woke up at 1230, and then the baby came over!!! im havin a bad day... people are pissed at me, and all this stuff is happenin. i think im quittin the league... i dont feel like dealing with everybody. im tryin to convince my family to move. lol. i hate this town with a passion, and i feel like no one even cares about me. i talk too much about myself. i dont get how one day i can be happy and then the next be completely depressed.im goin to talk to people who actually care. write later. - molly

well, today is so far so good. i was saposed to go and lay out, but screw that. i dont feel like gettin into my swimsuit. oh man after church today was somethin. we went to giant and ofcourse i wanted to try out the self check out. i hate those, their stupid and their a pain in the ass, well thats what i think. i had so much trouble with it a lady had to come over and help. i think tonight after supper im goin swimmin over lauren's and then i think shes sleepin over, well actually she didnt even ask yet haha. im bored, i actually should be cleaning my room, but i dont feel like it. oh and ya know what sucks. i have conditioning tomorrow at 4, ugh. well i think of it this way. i might as well get in shape early then later. im thinkin about starting to run at the Y again, but i gotta get a membership. i never really minded running, but im glad i didnt do cross country. i would have killed myself. im bored, like usual. well im gonna go find something to do. write later. if nothing lasts forever...will you be my nothing? - molly

today was a normal day i guess. i woke up because someone called my cell phone and i jumped outta bed cuz my ringer volume was at like 7...haha. then i went up lauren's grandmothers with her to go swimmin and we basically chilled out there for most of the day. then we went to wendys! oh man i love that place. lauren came over for a lil then, and then we chilled out some more. hahaha. then that whole explosion thing happened, i still didnt even talk to my brother to see if he was okay, since he lives in the heights and all... tonight was somethin though. ahah we decided to go swimming, what a mistake we were in for like 2sec. and then we jumped out it was so cold. haha. im actually in a good mood today. and im not sure why haha. i think for a change im gonna plan ahead and try to figure out what im doin. well after church,layin out sounds pretty good, thats if i dont get attacked by wasps or some type of bug.lol. wow i have been in such a good moo the past two days it isnt even funny. i miss bein happy like this. what a feeling lol. well im goin to talk to people on aim and mirc. write later. No matter what happens I'm gunna make it If I'm not happy I'll just fake it I've been thru backstabbers, bitches and lies Got a whole list of people I despise So if you got my trust don't lose it and if you got my love, don't abuse it. - molly

well, i guess i dont have as much free time as i always say i do, since i havnt posted in 3 days again. lets see... wed.i went to blaise's and brooke's birthday party at mt. laurel, that was fun, i met a lot of people & i went to the guys saullo serany games with ash and then we went for a walk. yesterday, i went up ash's and we played vball and basketball with a few people that aimee had over and josh that ashley had over. then lastnight i ahd basketball practice, it wasnt too bad, we did a lot of stuff to get into shape, and my legs kill today. then right after practice i went back up ash's (actually it didnt happen in thet order, but you get the idea). today, well today is another busy day, i think goin to play bball with lauren and jon, or somethin like that. i talked to suzanne yesterday, and i think i'm gonna play the summer league after all. oh well. i mean i wanted to play, i just didnt wanna deal with the people. i guess i'll stick it out and do w/e. well im goin. write later. itsz scary tO thiink hOw diiffErEnt yur liifE wOuld bEE iif yuh nEvEr mEt that pErsOn that chanqEd [| E v E r y t h ii n q |] - molly

wow, i havnt posted in a while. i think im gonna recap my life for the past 3 days. lets see. on saturday, well i had work and then i went over the caputo's house for about an hour or so, that was actually fun. sunday i had my uncles yearly 4th of july party, theres not really anything interesting to say about that. yesterday, well i attempted to play mini golf i ended up wit a 64? i think on an 18 hole corse, wow im pretty pathetic. 3 year olds could play better then me. but i was pretty happy that my ball didnt go into any form of water. i think they are there to just get people pissed off when they have to get their golf club and go digging in the water for their ball and end up finding 10 different colored balls in the process. i did come in 3rd tho. but for some reason i cant remb. anything i did lastnight. i know i went over laurens house, but after that its all a blur. idk, i think i came on the computer... oh well if i spoke to anybody and said anything that was stupid or physcotic, forget it. today, i ahve another double header... and everyone is away on vacation. so im probably gonna be playin more.joy. well im goin. write later. - molly

haha i have nothin to say today... but heres a convo to look at... he4r1ty 24: ok im still gonna look for a new icon that looks like me more Jonp3313: why dont u just take a picture of yourself and put it there lol he4r1ty 24: haha he4r1ty 24: cuz im ugly he4r1ty 24: ahha he4r1ty 24: and it would scare ppl Jonp3313: you have no self confidence do you he4r1ty 24: nope haha, ill write later cuz i got work. - molly

i got back from practice it was actually really fun. the only reason i think that was cuz we didnt really do anything except shooting drills and we went over a few new plays when your inbounding the ball (not like anyone really cares). im really bored, i wanna do somethin productive. i need to start goin to the Y again so i can get back into shape. ya know i wonder if anyone actually reads this... oh well. oh man im in a really bad mood the past two days it isnt even funny. i think i still kinda am. im not even gonna get into why i am cuz my whole life is stupid. the only thing that actually makes sense is basketball, which is making me sound like i have no life except basketball, and right about now i dont. tomorrow im making cookies for the 4th or july when i go down my uncles in drums. thats gonna be fun. oh man i wish i could drive. i cant get outta this house anymore. im so pissed off it isnt even funny, and i dont even exactly know why. well im goin upstairs to me room, to vent so i dont hurt someone. write later. I*vE cOmE tO ThE .POINT. WheRe nothiN matTers Anymore aNd ThInGs I uSeD tO kArE ABouT ArEnT wortH fiGhtin 4* - molly

well today is another day. so far today i woke up and went to the mall to get a new swim suit, then i went to wendys (i love that place). i just got home maybe 10mins. ago. i really dont wanna go to basketball practice today, all were gonna do is run, and i gotta remb. to bring my medicine with me so i dont fall on the court in pain today. sometimes i wonder if its just me but why am i the one who always ends up gettin screwed over... oh well ill live with it. write later. yOu didn`t just breaK my HearT- yOu kiLLed a parT of iT A brOken heArt can bE menDeD- bUt sOmething Dead caN`t bE heaLeD.. - molly

well today sucked...thats for sure. let me go through my day. 1st i didnt sleep at all lastnight. 2nd we lost both of our saullo games, the 1st one we should have won, dont even get me started on that. 3rd people just piss me off, plain and simple. 4th i love how whenever i try to make myself happy or try to help someone, im the one who always ends up screwed over. iv come to the conclusion that life screws us all. its days like these where i just wanna block everyone and everything, listen to music and eat. sounds pretty good to me. oh man, is my life f* up. i dont even know what im doing tomorrow, oh wait... i have practice, wondeful. i get to run and learn more plays and run sum more. im gonna love that. shoot me now please. well im sure everyone is sick of me moaning about me life so im gonna stop writting. write later. x \\ All I ever hear; be a good girl; just behave; sit up O // Straight; stand up tall; never falter; never fall; stay in x \\ School; make the grade; never fail; never fade; be a O // Hero; be a star; be *everything* but what you a r e - molly </3

sorry i havnt posted in a few days. the past two nites havnt been the greatest. i think its because of my father. everything i do is wrong. i feel like i cant even breathe without permission from him. i dont even know how i feel. im not really mad, im just really annoyed with my dad right now. im so close to gettin grounded, so i gotta watch what i say and what i do for a lil. i have a feeling that im gonna have no life because of what my dad is doin. i get soo pissed just thinkin about it. anyway, yest. i had my game. i had to play two games in a row cuz not all the girls for sergios showed up and melanie asked if i would play. i had 9 points, which wasnt bad. i wasnt shootin too much yest at either of my games. thats not necessarily a bad thing. my 2nd i sucked soo bad. idk wtf was up wit my calv muscles but everytime i would jump they would like pull and it would hurt really bad. there fine today but it basically fucked up how i was playin. ill do better tomorrow. i know i will. i guess those are the reasons im in the mood that im in. i shoudl probably go call roman and see what hes doin cuz i havnt talked to him in a while so im goin. write later. - molly *-_You Make My Life So Convenient For Me _-* * Love You Roman*

so far today is pretty boring. i went to church, served, and came home. wow, that was exciting let me tell ya. everybody kept on sayin "are ya ready for school" me: *looking at them like are u crazy* "uh no". i so dont wanna go back. conditioning is starting in 16 days, oh and believe me im not counting like im looking forward to it. i really dont feel like goin back to the chiropractor anytime soon. i hope my hip doesnt bother me tomorrow at my game. i have no idea what im doin today, im so bored. well im goin. write later. - molly

well its offical my life sucks. lastnite i walk in and got yelled at for about an hour about how by my father, about how i dont tell him everything im doing and stuff. basically it was all stupid stuff. theres more to the story but i cant fuckin take it anymore. well once oct. comes my brothers movin into his new house and then im allowed to go down there. oh yes and to top all of this, im not allowed in noells car until it gets fixed. oh yeah, and i dont think i mentioned that im not gettin a cell phone anymore becuase instead my parents lowered my mins on my phone! ahhhhhhhhhhh. *sigh*. my brother also found out about me and roman from romans mom! and then ofcourse he comes home and tells my aunt sophie. ugh... i dont wanna go to work tonite cuz im gonna hear about it. atleast its an escape from the freakin house. i was soo mad lastnite, you couldnt even imagine. 4 more years, then im finally 18 and i can do what I want. well atleast roman is home. i saw danny and chad lastnite. they say hes "dying". he has a virus from what im hearing. i should probably call him before work today. unless this talk with my dad doesnt take 4587875 hours. im so not looking forward to that. i still need a shower, oh well i dont care, ill get one before i go to work. well id say this is one of my longest posts in a while. i dont feel good and im hungry. i dont wanna eat though, cause if i do then ill get sick. im gonna go find somethin to do. write later hopefully, if im still alive after this talk with my father. If I never see your face If wings take you away from me And tomorrow never happens, baby If the world comes tumbling down And crumbles all around us Fate turns cruel You're on your knees So desperate for one truth Know that I have loved you 7.31.04 (2 weeks, 1 day) I Love You Roman - molly

well i went to the chiropractor today and it turns out that my whole lower back was all twisted, thats why my hip was all messed up. i feel sooo much better. i gotta put ice on it every night, and thats what im doing right now actually. BTW 4 MORE DAYS till i get my new phone. i have not so good news too. romans sick. i talked to danny and lauren today and hes been sick all day. i miss him. i hope hes okay. tomorrow i actually might have plans. i think im goin out wit noelle or somethin along those lines. im gonna go talk to people on mirc and aim. write later. i miss you ~ i love you roman molly

i think i disloacted my hip. i cant even walk or put pressure on my right leg, and i jammed my finger. thats a basic summary of my basketball practice. im goin to the chiropractor tomorrow, thank god. ugh.. i cant even type cuz i have my town fingers tapped together. wow im a mess tonite. today was boring as hell up until i like killed myself. i wanna go outside but idk if i can get there fast enough w.o falling. ugh.. im frusterated. this sucks cuz i wanna play tomorrow wit noelle. i wanna go outttttt. i hate sittin in the freakin house. maybe ill go sit outside just to get away from my family. write later. will you be mine on this day will you be the sunshine in rain will you be the stars in my nights will you be the joy, the joy in my life will you be my everything will you be the happy song i sing will you be the love i cant deny will you be the love, the love of all time will you be mine ruff endz ~ will you be mine xOxO Molly

well im almost positive im goin to newark wit my aunt romane to take my aunt barbra to the airport. then i have a team meeting/open gym for basketball at hafey tonite at 630. thats gonna be fun... ya right. i talked to lauren and roman the other night. i want them to come home already. i miss them too much. wow im really suprirised i woke up this early today. i was realy tirted lasnite, i fell asleep around 1230 usually i dont go to sleep till like 130. oh well. i need to call my aunt and find out when were leavin today so i know when i should get a shower and get ready. i dont know if i wanna go now. hmm... and i just found out were leaving at 1. well i have time to kill. so im gonna go. write later. it doesn`t matter how long you've known him .. if he kept you smiling from day -one- then you * should -- > n e v e r . l o s e . h i m - molly

well yesterday was somethin alright. from the time i woke up until the time i went out with noelle, i was gettin screamed at for the stupidest stuff, you couldnt even imagine. im not even gonna get into it, but it turned out that i wasnt allowed to sleep over noelles cuz i had a friend over when my dad was gettin ready for the wedding, i dont know, it was somethin gay like that. so instead i ate supper and then noelle picked me up and we went out. we decided to pick up justin tarone then and we drove around wit him. i saw a few people lastnight, i saw sateach, the moyers, and tresckow people haha. it turns out that noelle slept over here and we ordered pizza from papa johns at like 1130 haha. i ate like 5 pieces cuz i was pissed off at people and i was really hungry. but newayzz. today i have to go to my sisters play... enough said. my parents said they dont think im gonna make it home in time to go with noelle to the mcadoo games. i have a feeling im gonna be on my cell phone talkin to people so i dont loose my sanity. all im sayin is we better go out to eat. i wanna get good food outta this trip. this doesnt make sense to me. she never came to one of my basketball games, not one, and i have to go to this. oh well, god forbid i say anything to my parents about it, theyll have my head. well im gonna go and try to get my cd player to work so i dont have to listen to oldies on the way down to bloomsburg. write later. - molly

well yesterday wasnt bad. i went out to at with lauren before she left to friendlys. that went pretty well. then i went up the courts and roman, danny and stan(everntually a.j. came up) were up there. me and aimee ended up playin 3 on 3 with them. then i had my game at 7, which only 3 of the people on my team showed up, so we had taylor, aimee, and ash play. it was just like old times.ad tay had 10 i think, we all did pretty good. but ofcourse they dont put it in the paper today. but newayz. after my game lastnight noelle came and picked me up, i ran to my house and got a shower. then we ahd to take casey and jeremy out to the movies and pick up joey pacelli and justin tarone. im not gonna really get into details but we picked up an dropped off a lot of people. then roman called me and i ended up bein able to see him before he goes away today. im really gonna miss him. anymore we'v been seening eachother almost everyday and now im not gonna see him for a week. oh well. and then lauren is leavin me too! its like wtf is up wit this saturday that everybody is like leavin me! oh well ill deal wit it. now tonight is gonna be my fun night wit noelle. im sleepin over her house and im not really sure what were doing but its gonna be fun haha. my parents are goin to a wedding today so its just gonna be me and my aunt sophie for a lil and then im goin to noelle's. well im goin to find somethin to do. write later. Let me be your angel and I'll be your protection I Love You Roman - molly

well today was a pretty good day i guess, besides the fact that i was half dead from waking up at 8 0'clock this morning. the seniors took all the freshman and that to go order our sneakers. there pretty nice, white jordans, $79, not too bad for jordans. after we ordered them we went to american eagle and a few other places then we went to red robin for lunch. that was good. when i came home i was bored, thats nothin new. then i went for a ride wit noelle and then we went to her house. which pretty much consisted of jeremy yellin at me to walk on his abck and when im walking outta the house, him grabbing my leg and not letting me leave. ahahha. im hopefully doing somethin tomorrow night. i hope ill see roman and lauren cuz their both leaving for the shore saturday :(( im gonna miss them. well i guess my night is pretty much coming to a close. so im goin to say goodnight. write later. -tHe WoRsT Is OvEr nOw, & We CaN BrEaThE aGaIn- - seether ft. amy lee ~ broken iLuRoman - molly

ahah wow i havnt writen in here in a while. yesterday i went to knobles with lauren, jill, danny, and roman. haah it was soo much fun. then today i had to wake up at 9 to paint the girls locker room at hafey wit the rest of the senior high basketball team. that was soo much fun once again. tomorrow were goin wit the seniors to w/b to get our team sneakers (white jordans). and then tonight im sleepin over noelles. what a week so far jeez. monday was the 1st day for the league. i ahd 17 points!! yay! ahah i doubt that will happen again. well im goin to find somethin to do. write later. `peace - molly
